query:
SELECT 
    p.proname,
    pg_get_function_identity_arguments(p.oid) AS args,
    p.prosrc AS body
FROM pg_proc p
JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = p.pronamespace
WHERE n.nspname = 'public'
  AND p.proname IN ('pay_with_wallet', 'p2p_wallet_transfer', 'reconcile_wallet_balances', 'verify_wallet_integrity')
ORDER BY p.proname;
